title: Promptless | Automatic updates for your customer-facing docs
description: Promptless uses AI agents to automatically update customer-facing documentation, including tutorials, how-to guides, API docs, knowledge bases, support articles, and blog posts.

Effective December 1, 2024

At Promptless, accessible from gopromptless.ai, your privacy is of paramount importance to us. This Privacy Policy document outlines the types of personal information that is collected and recorded by Promptless and how we use it.
By using our website and services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.
We collect both personal and non-personal information when you interact with our website and services. This information may include:
Personal Information:
Name
Email address
Billing information (if applicable)
User credentials for account registration and login
Any other information you choose to provide (e.g., support requests, feedback)
Non-Personal Information:
Browser type and version
IP address
Pages visited on our website
Time spent on pages
Referring website URLs
Other usage data collected through cookies or similar tracking technologies
We use the collected information for the following purposes:
To provide and improve our services: We use your information to process transactions, respond to your inquiries, and provide personalized experiences.

To communicate with you: This includes sending you promotional emails, newsletters, and updates about our services. You can opt out of receiving promotional emails at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in the email or contacting us directly.
To ensure website security: We monitor and analyze usage data to enhance the functionality and security of our website.
To comply with legal obligations: In certain cases, we may need to disclose your information to comply with legal requirements, enforce our policies, or protect our rights.

We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. If you wish to delete your account or request the removal of your personal information, please contact us at help@gopromptless.ai.

Promptless uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your user experience and gather information about website usage. Cookies are small files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. These cookies help us understand your preferences and improve our site’s functionality.

You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings, including blocking cookies or receiving notifications when a cookie is being set. However, please note that some features of our website may not function properly if cookies are disabled.
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except in the following situations:

With service providers: We may share your information with third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf (e.g., payment processors, email service providers). These service providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and use it solely for the purposes for which we disclose it.
Business transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred to the new owner.
As required by law: We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, or investigate fraud.
Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information. These may include:
Access: You can request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
Correction: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
Deletion: You can request the deletion of your personal information under certain conditions.
Restriction: You can request the restriction of processing your personal information.
Portability: You may request a copy of your data in a structured, commonly used format.
Opt-out: You can opt-out of receiving promotional communications at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or contacting us directly.
To exercise these rights, please contact us at help@gopromptless.ai. We will respond to your request within the timeframes required by law.

We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Our website may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any external websites before submitting any personal information.

Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete that information. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us at help@gopromptless.ai.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we make changes, we will update the "Effective Date" at the top of this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:
Email: help@gopromptless.ai
Website: https://gopromptless.ai
Support: help@promptless.ai |
